sentence.Network_en: I was touched by his solicitude for the boy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对孩子的关怀让我感动。

sentence.Network_en: The solicitude shown him by his neighbours after robbery touched him deeply.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被抢劫后邻居对他的关切使他十分感动.

sentence.Network_en: Your solicitude was a great consolation to me.
sentence.Network_cn: 你对我的关怀给了我莫大的安慰.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French sollicitude, from Latin sollicitudo, from sollicitus (see solicitous)

entry.def: Solicitude is anxious concern for someone.

example.ex: He is full of tender solicitude towards my sister.

auth_sentence.content: Now, out of sisterly solicitude, she grew anxious.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now, out of sisterly solicitude, she grew anxious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now, out of sisterly solicitude, she grew anxious.

auth_sentence.content: She felt an intense morbid solicitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She felt an intense morbid solicitude.

auth_sentence.content: She alone, he said, could manage me, and spare me the solicitude of managing myself.
auth_sentence.res_content: She alone, he said, could manage me, and spare me the solicitude of managing myself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She alone, he said, could manage me, and spare me the solicitude of managing myself.

sentences.cn: 日常生活中令人担心的事情。
